channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WV

item.title: Report X-2024090331
item.description:
Report X-2024090331

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-08T09:12:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-03
  • City: SOUTH CHARLESTON
  • State: WV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ONE AIR PACKAGE AT THE FINAL UPS DELIVERY CENTER DESTINATION WAS FOUND LEAKING. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED AN INNER BERGER-SEIDLE CLASSIC EXPRESS BOX THAT CONTAINED FOUR GALLON CANS OF FLAMMABLE CLASSIC EXPRESS STAIN. ONE OF THE CANS WAS LEAKING FROM THE CLOSURE. THE INNER FOUR CANS HAVE DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS AND LABELS. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTERMOST BROWN FIBERBOARD BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM SOUTH CAROLINA USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER J5H558, WHITE, 4115 DORCHESTER RD, NORTH CHARLESTON SC 29405-7466.
